alert.note: Alert for Polk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:19PM CDT until July 03 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Polk County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Luck, or 30 miles southeast of Pine City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Polk County, including the following locations... Mckinley, Straight Lake Wilderness State Park, Clam Falls and Lewis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
